segments.text: Hey Mei Hong , how are you getting to Xi ’ an next week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m not sure yet . I may take the train but then again I might take the bus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah but the bus takes a long time . You could fly - it ’ s not so expensive these days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Maybe I ’ ll do that then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok well , you let me know your schedule and I ’ ll book a ticket for you .
segments.speaker: S1
